00069 #ifndef _BASICTYPES_INCLUDED_
00070 #define _BASICTYPES_INCLUDED_
00071 
00072 //
00073 // Basic type.  Arrays, vectors, etc., are orthogonal to this.
00074 //
00075 enum TBasicType
00076 {
00077    EbtVoid,
00078    EbtFloat,
00079    EbtInt,
00080    EbtBool,
00081    EbtGuardSamplerBegin,  // non type:  see implementation of IsSampler()
00082    EbtSamplerGeneric,     // untyped D3D sampler, assumes type via usage
00083    EbtSampler1D,
00084    EbtSampler2D,
00085    EbtSampler3D,
00086    EbtSamplerCube,
00087    EbtSampler1DShadow,
00088    EbtSampler2DShadow,
00089    EbtSamplerRect,        // ARB_texture_rectangle
00090    EbtSamplerRectShadow,  // ARB_texture_rectangle
00091    EbtGuardSamplerEnd,    // non type:  see implementation of IsSampler()
00092    EbtTexture,            // HLSL Texture variable (presently just a dummy) 
00093    EbtStruct,
00094    EbtAddress,            // should be deprecated??
00095 };
00096 
00097 __inline bool IsSampler(TBasicType type)
00098 {
00099    return type > EbtGuardSamplerBegin && type < EbtGuardSamplerEnd;
00100 }
00101 
00102 __inline bool IsNumeric(TBasicType type)
00103 {
00104    return type > EbtVoid && type < EbtGuardSamplerBegin;
00105 }
00106 
00107 //
00108 // Qualifiers and built-ins.  These are mainly used to see what can be read
00109 // or written, and by the machine dependent translator to know which registers
00110 // to allocate variables in.  Since built-ins tend to go to different registers
00111 // than varying or uniform, it makes sense they are peers, not sub-classes.
00112 //
00113 enum TQualifier
00114 {
00115    EvqTemporary,     // For temporaries (within a function), read/write
00116    EvqGlobal,        // For globals read/write
00117    EvqConst,         // User defined constants and non-output parameters in functions
00118    EvqAttribute,     // Readonly 
00119    EvqVaryingIn,     // readonly, fragment shaders only
00120    EvqVaryingOut,    // vertex shaders only  read/write
00121    EvqUniform,       // Readonly, vertex and fragment
00122    EvqMutableUniform, //HLSL uniform value, that is not really uniform
00123 
00124    // pack/unpack input and output
00125    EvqInput,
00126    EvqOutput,
00127 
00128    // parameters
00129    EvqIn,
00130    EvqOut,
00131    EvqInOut,
00132    EvqConstReadOnly,
00133 
00134    // built-ins written by vertex shader
00135    EvqPosition,
00136    EvqPointSize,
00137    EvqClipVertex,
00138 
00139    // built-ins read by fragment shader
00140    EvqFace,
00141    EvqFragCoord,
00142 
00143    // built-ins written by fragment shader
00144    EvqFragColor,
00145    EvqFragDepth,
00146 
00147    // end of list
00148    EvqLast,
00149 };
00150 
00151 //
00152 // This is just for debug print out, carried along with the definitions above.
00153 //
00154 __inline const char* getQualifierString(TQualifier q) 
00155 {
00156    switch (q)
00157    {
00158    case EvqTemporary:      return "Temporary";      break;
00159    case EvqGlobal:         return "Global";         break;
00160    case EvqConst:          return "const";          break;
00161    case EvqConstReadOnly:  return "const";          break;
00162    case EvqAttribute:      return "attribute";      break;
00163    case EvqVaryingIn:      return "varying";        break;
00164    case EvqVaryingOut:     return "varying";        break;
00165    case EvqUniform:        return "uniform";        break;
00166    case EvqIn:             return "in";             break;
00167    case EvqOut:            return "out";            break;
00168    case EvqInOut:          return "inout";          break;
00169    case EvqInput:          return "input";          break;
00170    case EvqOutput:         return "output";         break;
00171    case EvqPosition:       return "Position";       break;
00172    case EvqPointSize:      return "PointSize";      break;
00173    case EvqClipVertex:     return "ClipVertex";     break;
00174    case EvqFace:           return "Face";           break;
00175    case EvqFragCoord:      return "FragCoord";      break;
00176    case EvqFragColor:      return "FragColor";      break;
00177    case EvqFragDepth:      return "FragDepth";      break;
00178    default:                return "unknown qualifier";
00179    }
00180 }
00181 
00182 #endif // _BASICTYPES_INCLUDED_
